attributes.action: CSA - when making a maintenance assessment - look at Bank accounts aswell as Accounts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the S/E accounts sometimes do not tally with the actual Earnings, then the CSA should have access to bank accounts/statements/details from the beginning to assess correct payments as people who are S/E can say they earn very little and then only pay small amounts or nothing to the CSA for the PWC.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
